about_the_game:
AutoTileSet (DLC)

After creating your tiles with AutoTileGen you can easily edit your levels with AutoTileSet. AutoTileSet is an autotile tool that picks the correct image for each tile depending on its neighbours. You only have to worry about whether tiles are solid or not and AutoTileSet will take care of the rest.
AutoTileSet is compatible with the most popular game development middlewares: Unity, GameMaker and Construct 2.
detailed_description:
AutoTileSet (DLC)

After creating your tiles with AutoTileGen you can easily edit your levels with AutoTileSet. AutoTileSet is an autotile tool that picks the correct image for each tile depending on its neighbours. You only have to worry about whether tiles are solid or not and AutoTileSet will take care of the rest.
AutoTileSet is compatible with the most popular game development middlewares: Unity, GameMaker and Construct 2.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A

name: AutoTileSet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP | Vista | 7 | 8 | 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 1.5 GHz
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
